# Portable Air Monitoring Station Tender (K3B41-230317)
=====================================================

**General Information**
-------------------

* **Project Reference**: WS3863397847
* **Contract Number**: K3B41-230317
* **Publication Date**: December 13, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 17, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3863397847

**Tender Details**
-----------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bidders to submit proposals for the supply of a portable multi-parameter air quality monitoring station.

**Specifications**
----------------

* **UNSpsc Code**: 41112200 (Temperature and heat measuring instruments)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
* **Notices Type**: Request for proposal
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

**Delivery and Trade**
--------------------

* **Regions of Delivery**: Nova Scotia, Canada
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contracting Entity Information**
--------------------------------

* **Contracting Entity Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Point of Contact**: Brian Secord (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [brian.secord@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:brian.secord@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Tender Documentation**
-------------------------

The complete tender documentation is available electronically through the Government of Canada's [Supply and Services spectrum](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18130518?extsite=MTgxMzA1MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).

**Closing Date**
------------------

The tender closing date is January 17, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST. Late submissions will not be accepted. The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) reserves the right to cancel or reject this tender at any time without prior notice.

Do not submit any bids. Protocol is that GGCC/CFTA written consent is needed before linking or inviting people you do not know to GGCC
